headline: Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend on Series I Preferred Stock
summary: Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) recently declared a quarterly cash dividend on its Series I Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, reinforcing its commitment to shareholder value. Over the last quarter, the company's stock price increased by 15%. This performance aligns with the broader market's gains, impacted by an overall 19% increase over the year. The company also reported strong earnings results in July, with net interest income and net income both rising compared to the previous year...
